name: Born Again
description:
Fight, Die, and Repeat in the realms of Born Again! A thrilling permadeath, rogue-like, MMORPG where every life is full of challenges and rewards at every turn. Embark on a fateful journey to defeat the enemies bringing disorder to the Outer Realms. Face off against kings, rulers, and deities all fighting for their reign in this pixel-art world filled with charm and excitement.

Born Again offers fast-paced, action-packed combat with its hack-n-slash gameplay mechanics that will keep you on your toes. Engage in exhilarating battles with hordes of enemies using a variety of weapons and unleash unique abilities to turn the tide of battle in your favor. As you progress, you'll have the opportunity to customize your play-style by choosing from a wide selection of items and blessings to equip, tailoring your character's abilities and powers to suit your play-style.

But beware, Born Again is not for the faint of heart. Death is inevitable and not the end, but rather a chance to be Born Again to anew with fresh opportunities and challenges. Take on the rulers of the realm, challenging boss battles that will test your skills to the limit, and prove yourself as a true hero of the realm.

With its charming pixel-art graphics, Born Again offers a unique visual style that is both nostalgic and captivating. Explore a vast world filled with secrets, treasures, and mysteries waiting to be uncovered. Dive into the chaotic world and unravel the mysteries of the world as you progress through the game.

Born Again is not just about the battles, but also about the loot. Discover and equip a wide range of items, weapons, and armor as you explore the world and defeat enemies. Each item has its own niche and properties, allowing you to strategically plan your loadout and adapt to various situations.

Are you ready to be Born Again and embark on an epic adventure filled with hack-n-slash action, rogue-like challenges, and thrilling boss battles? Join the fray in Born Again and experience an MMORPG like no other!
